description: This file defines a Python module for interacting with the Jina Reader API, including configuration, URL reading, and search functionalities, encapsulated within classes and methods.

classes.name: JinaReaderToolsConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for Jina Reader API settings, including API key, URLs, content length, and timeout.

classes.name: JinaReaderTools
classes.description: Main class providing methods to read URLs and perform searches using the Jina Reader API, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: read_url
methods.description: Reads content from a URL via the Jina API and returns truncated content.

methods.name: search_query
methods.description: Performs a search query via the Jina API and returns truncated results.

methods.name: _get_headers
methods.description: Constructs headers for API requests, including authorization if API key is provided.

methods.name: _truncate_content
methods.description: Truncates content to the maximum length specified in the configuration.
